oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A letter from Mrs. F. R. Robertson to Mrs. W. O. Garner
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Robertson, Rose H.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Garner, William Orland; Robertson, Rose H.; Garner, Letitia Hastings; Garner, Herbert Solomon; Correspondence; Claremont (Calif.); Knoxville (Tenn.); Garner, Herbert Solomon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this letter to her "Aunt Letty," Mrs. WO Garner, Rose Robertson tells about a visit to Bert's Garner's cabin in the woods in Maryville, Tennessee, of his health and other topics. In the letter, Rose mentions the stones that her grandfather had used in his original homestead had been moved to Bert's home.
